description: Expected violations for golden file testing. Shared input for all reporter golden files.

violations.message: Assertion 'toBeDefined()' only checks existence. Assert the actual value with toBe(), toEqual(), or toMatchObject().
Assertion 'toBeTruthy()' only checks truthiness. Assert the actual value with toBe(), toEqual(), or toMatchObject().
Function 'getUser' has no negative test cases. Add tests for error paths, invalid inputs, and edge cases.
